### Environment ====================================================================================
project_name <- gsub("(.*)_.*", "\\1", basename(params[["project_directory"]]))
output_directory <- params[["output_directory"]]
dir.create(path = output_directory, recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = FALSE, mode = "0775")


### Load packages ==================================================================================
library(here)

suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(knitr)
  library(gt)
  library(ggplot2)
  library(mctemplates)
})


### knitr settings =================================================================================
opts_chunk$set(
  eval = TRUE,
  include = TRUE,
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  dpi = 120,
  tidy = FALSE,
  crop = TRUE,
  autodep = TRUE,
  results = "asis",
  fig.align = "center",
  width = getOption("width"),
  comment = "#>",
  fig.path = file.path(output_directory, "images/")
)


### Define theme ===================================================================================
options(
  ggplot2.discrete.colour = scale_colour_viridis_d,
  ggplot2.discrete.fill = scale_fill_viridis_d,
  ggplot2.continuous.colour = scale_colour_viridis_c,
  ggplot2.continuous.fill = scale_fill_viridis_c
)
theme_set(theme_black_md())
